name: Run baby run
description:
This game was make for the Pizza Jam 3.

The game is pretty simple : you just have to survive as long as you can.

The theme was :

" Use the title of one of these games on this list to inspire your game.
Ignore what the actual game is about. Base it entirely on the name! https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ZX_Spectrum_games "

Controls : 

 In the menu :

   - x : start

 In game:

   - up : jump

   - x : return to the menu   

   - w/z/o : restart
